36 namespace cinder {
37 
38 template<typename T>
39 struct math
40 {
41  static T acos (T x) {return ::acos (double(x));}
42  static T asin (T x) {return ::asin (double(x));}
43  static T atan (T x) {return ::atan (double(x));}
44  static T atan2 (T y, T x) {return ::atan2 (double(y), double(x));}
45  static T cos (T x) {return ::cos (double(x));}
46  static T sin (T x) {return ::sin (double(x));}
47  static T tan (T x) {return ::tan (double(x));}
48  static T cosh (T x) {return ::cosh (double(x));}
49  static T sinh (T x) {return ::sinh (double(x));}
50  static T tanh (T x) {return ::tanh (double(x));}
51  static T exp (T x) {return ::exp (double(x));}
52  static T log (T x) {return ::log (double(x));}
53  static T log10 (T x) {return ::log10 (double(x));}
54  static T modf (T x, T *iptr)
55  {
56  double ival;
57  T rval( ::modf (double(x),&ival));
58  *iptr = ival;
59  return rval;
60  }
61  static T pow (T x, T y) {return ::pow (double(x), double(y));}
62  static T sqrt (T x) {return ::sqrt (double(x));}
63 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
64  static T cbrt( T x ) { return ( x > 0 ) ? (::pow( x, 1.0 / 3.0 )) : (- ::pow( -x, 1.0 / 3.0 ) ); }
65 #else
66  static T cbrt( T x ) { return ::cbrt( x ); }
67 #endif
68  static T ceil (T x) {return ::ceil (double(x));}
69  static T abs (T x) {return ::fabs (double(x));}
70  static T floor (T x) {return ::floor (double(x));}
71  static T fmod (T x, T y) {return ::fmod (double(x), double(y));}
72  static T hypot (T x, T y) {return ::hypot (double(x), double(y));}
73  static T signum (T x) {return ( x >0.0 ) ? 1.0 : ( ( x < 0.0 ) ? -1.0 : 0.0 ); }
74  static T min(T x, T y) {return ( x < y ) ? x : y; }
75  static T max(T x, T y) {return ( x > y ) ? x : y; }
76  static T clamp(T x, T min=0, T max=1) {return ( x < min ) ? min : ( ( x > max ) ? max : x );}
77 };
78 
79 
80 template<>
81 struct math<float>
82 {
83  static float acos (float x) {return ::acosf (x);}
84  static float asin (float x) {return ::asinf (x);}
85  static float atan (float x) {return ::atanf (x);}
86  static float atan2 (float y, float x) {return ::atan2f (y, x);}
87  static float cos (float x) {return ::cosf (x);}
88  static float sin (float x) {return ::sinf (x);}
89  static float tan (float x) {return ::tanf (x);}
90  static float cosh (float x) {return ::coshf (x);}
91  static float sinh (float x) {return ::sinhf (x);}
92  static float tanh (float x) {return ::tanhf (x);}
93  static float exp (float x) {return ::expf (x);}
94  static float log (float x) {return ::logf (x);}
95  static float log10 (float x) {return ::log10f (x);}
96  static float modf (float x, float *y) {return ::modff (x, y);}
97  static float pow (float x, float y) {return ::powf (x, y);}
98  static float sqrt (float x) {return ::sqrtf (x);}
99 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
100  static float cbrt( float x ) { return ( x > 0 ) ? (::powf( x, 1.0f / 3.0f )) : (- ::powf( -x, 1.0f / 3.0f ) ); }
101 #else
102  static float cbrt (float x) { return ::cbrtf( x ); }
103 #endif
104  static float ceil (float x) {return ::ceilf (x);}
105  static float abs (float x) {return ::fabsf (x);}
106  static float floor (float x) {return ::floorf (x);}
107  static float fmod (float x, float y) {return ::fmodf (x, y);}
108  #if !defined(_MSC_VER)
109  static float hypot (float x, float y) {return ::hypotf (x, y);}
110  #else
111  static float hypot (float x, float y) {return ::sqrtf(x*x + y*y);}
112  #endif
113  static float signum (float x) {return ( x > 0.0f ) ? 1.0f : ( ( x < 0.0f ) ? -1.0f : 0.0f ); }
114  static float min(float x, float y) {return ( x < y ) ? x : y; }
115  static float max(float x, float y) {return ( x > y ) ? x : y; }
116  static float clamp(float x, float min=0, float max=1) {return ( x < min ) ? min : ( ( x > max ) ? max : x );}
117 };

123 const double EPSILON_VALUE = 4.37114e-05;
124 #define EPSILON EPSILON_VALUE

126 inline float toRadians( float x )
127 {
128  return x * 0.017453292519943295769f; // ( x * PI / 180 )
129 }
130 
131 inline double toRadians( double x )
132 {
133  return x * 0.017453292519943295769; // ( x * PI / 180 )
134 }
135 
136 inline float toDegrees( float x )
137 {
138  return x * 57.295779513082321f; // ( x * 180 / PI )
139 }
140 
141 inline double toDegrees( double x )
142 {
143  return x * 57.295779513082321; // ( x * 180 / PI )
144 }
145 
146 template<typename T, typename L>
147 T lerp( const T &a, const T &b, L factor )
148 {
149  return a + ( b - a ) * factor;
150 }
151 
152 template<typename T>
153 T lmap(T val, T inMin, T inMax, T outMin, T outMax)
154 {
155  return outMin + (outMax - outMin) * ((val - inMin) / (inMax - inMin));
156 }
157 
158 template<typename T, typename L>
159 T bezierInterp( T a, T b, T c, T d, L t)
160 {
161  L t1 = static_cast<L>(1.0) - t;
162  return a*(t1*t1*t1) + b*(3*t*t1*t1) + c*(3*t*t*t1) + d*(t*t*t);
163 }
164 
165 template<typename T, typename L>
166 T bezierInterpRef( const T &a, const T &b, const T &c, const T &d, L t)
167 {
168  L t1 = static_cast<L>(1.0) - t;
169  return a*(t1*t1*t1) + b*(3*t*t1*t1) + c*(3*t*t*t1) + d*(t*t*t);
170 }
171 
172 template<typename T>
173 T constrain( T val, T minVal, T maxVal )
174 {
175  if( val < minVal ) return minVal;
176  else if( val > maxVal ) return maxVal;
177  else return val;
178 }
179 
180 // Don Hatch's version of sin(x)/x, which is accurate for very small x.
181 // Returns 1 for x == 0.
182 template <class T>
183 T sinx_over_x( T x )
184 {
185  if( x * x < 1.19209290E-07F )
186  return T( 1 );
187  else
188  return math<T>::sin( x ) / x;
189 }
190 
191 // There are faster techniques for this, but this is portable
192 inline uint32_t log2floor( uint32_t x )
193 {
194  uint32_t result = 0;
195  while( x >>= 1 )
196  ++result;
197 
198  return result;
199 }
200 
201 inline uint32_t log2ceil( uint32_t x )
202 {
203  uint32_t isNotPowerOf2 = (x & (x - 1));
204  return ( isNotPowerOf2 ) ? (log2floor( x ) + 1) : log2floor( x );
205 }
206 
207 inline uint32_t nextPowerOf2( uint32_t x )
208 {
209  x |= (x >> 1);
210  x |= (x >> 2);
211  x |= (x >> 4);
212  x |= (x >> 8);
213  x |= (x >> 16);
214  return(x+1);
215 }
216 
217 template<typename T>
218 inline int solveLinear( T a, T b, T result[1] )
219 {
220  if( a == 0 ) return (b == 0 ? -1 : 0 );
221  result[0] = -b / a;
222  return 1;
223 }
224 
225 template<typename T>
226 inline int solveQuadratic( T a, T b, T c, T result[2] )
227 {
228  if( a == 0 ) return solveLinear( b, c, result );
229 
230  T radical = b * b - 4 * a * c;
231  if( radical < 0 ) return 0;
232 
233  if( radical == 0 ) {
234  result[0] = -b / (2 * a);
235  return 1;
236  }
237 
238  T srad = math<T>::sqrt( radical );
239  result[0] = ( -b - srad ) / (2 * a);
240  result[1] = ( -b + srad ) / (2 * a);
241  if( a < 0 ) std::swap( result[0], result[1] );
242  return 2;
243 }
244 
245 template<typename T>
246 int solveCubic( T a, T b, T c, T d, T result[3] );
247

254 }
